articles.content:
Last year, Huawei sold its entire Honor subsidiary brand to the Shenzhen Zhixin New Information Co. Ltd., which consists of more than 30 companies and dealers in China.
It was reported over the week… [+3471 chars]

articles.title: OnePlus 9 and 9 Pro key specs revealed in huge new leak - Android Central
articles.description: A new leak has shed light on some of the key specs of OnePlus' upcoming flagship duo. Both the OnePlus 9 and 9 Pro might arrive with identical display sizes as their predecessors.
articles.content: Last month, a massive leak revealed quite a few details about OnePlus' upcoming flagship phones, including their battery size and charging speeds. More key specs of the OnePlus 9 series phones have n… [+1163 chars]

articles.title: Microsoft Surface Laptop Go review: The compact notebook for writers and journalists - The Indian Express
articles.description: The fact that it’s small and lightweight, and also has a full-size keyboard, and is powerful enough to get the work done makes the Surface Laptop Go winner for writers and journalists.
